addons.description: Auto Search for Subtitles on Playback start if no subs are found.[CR][CR]Icon credits goes to zNET Computer Solutions http://www.znetcs.pl
addons.name: service.autosubs
addons.news:
v1.1.1 (2020-04-26) by juokelis
- Fixed: Exception settings are ignored

v1.1.0 (2020-03-21) by juokelis
- Ported to python 3 to run on v19 Matrix
- strings.xml > strings.po

v1.0.0 - schumi2004,CaTz, Mafarricos
- Several fixes
- Clean up
- Added translations: Dutch, Portuguese
- Exclude setting based on video duration
- Check for specific language
addons.summary: Auto Search for Subtitles on Play

addons.description: Search and download subtitles for movies and TV-Series from OpenSubtitles.org. Search in 75 languages, 4.000.000+ subtitles, daily updates.
addons.disclaimer: Users need to provide OpenSubtitles.org username and password in add-on configuration
addons.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
addons.name: service.subtitles.opensubtitles
